EmailTemplate.name: Green Circle Prospect VMworld Passes.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.first name:default=}}: Join the Green Circle, Complete the Challenges, Go to VMworld.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're sending 2 members of the GREEN CIRCLE COMMUNITY to VMworld.
Sign Up. Poke Around. Be One of Them. <http://bit.ly/1sodN0j> Join The Green Circle & Experience VMworld On Us. {{lead.First Name:default=}},
You were recently granted access to The Green Circle Community <http://bit.ly/1sodN0j>, our free, online portal for VMTurbo believers to convene, converse, and contribute to the evolution of virtualization management.You are a virtual visionary, one of the best minds in IT, and we want your voice.
And now we want to send you to VMworld. Complete all 3 of these challenges by July 21st for a chance to win:
1. Log In to the Green Circle <http://bit.ly/1sodN0j> (User Name: {{lead.First Name:default=}}.{{lead.Last Name:default=}} Password: Greencircle1) 2. Comment on an existing thread 3. Start a new discussion Sign Up Today <http://bit.ly/1sodN0j> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
